ee.adit.util
Class Configuration

java.lang.Object
  ee.adit.util.Configuration

public class Configuration
extends java.lang.Object

Application configuration holder class. The configuring takes place during startup and the parameters are specified in the servlet configuration.

Author:
Marko Kurm, Microlink Eesti AS, marko.kurm@microlink.ee, Jaak Lember, Interinx, jaak@interinx.com

Field Detail

getJoinedMaxResults

private java.math.BigInteger getJoinedMaxResults
Specifies the maximum result size of the getJoined query

tempDir

private java.lang.String tempDir
Working directory. Temporary files are held here.

deleteTemporaryFiles

private java.lang.String deleteTemporaryFiles
Specifies if the temporary files are to be deleted immediately after use. This parameter is useful when debugging.

schedulerEventTypeName

private java.lang.String schedulerEventTypeName
The name of the event type that is used in the X-Tee notifications calendar.

dvkResponseMessageStylesheet

private java.lang.String dvkResponseMessageStylesheet
The location of the stylesheet that is used to generate a response message to DVK.

globalDiskQuota

private java.lang.Long globalDiskQuota
Global disk quota per user specified in bytes. This is used in case no specific quota is declared for the user.

locales

private java.util.List<java.lang.String> locales
The locales that specify in which languages the error messages are returned. The format for the locale is "[langCode]_[countryCode]", for example "en_us" / "et_ee".

dvkOrgCode

private java.lang.String dvkOrgCode

private java.lang.String xteeInstitution

private java.lang.String xteeSecurityServer

xteeIdCode

private java.lang.String xteeIdCode
